subject: Figure Skating
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
World Figure Skating Championships
lead_paragraph: Six countries have put in bids to replace Japan as host of the world figure skating championships, which were postponed this week because of the earthquake, tsunami and nuclear threat there.
snippet: Six countries have put in bids to replace Japan as host of the world figure skating championships, which were postponed this week because of the earthquake, tsunami and nuclear threat there.
